messages.content: Welcome! I'm your Self Development coach. I'm here to help you grow personally and professionally. What would you like to work on today?
I want to improve my time management skills. I often feel like I don't have enough time in the day.

Time management is a common challenge. Let's start with understanding how you currently spend your time. For the next 3 days, could you track your activities hourly? This will help us identify where your time is actually going.
That makes sense. I'll try tracking my time. Do you have any recommendations for methods or apps I could use?

Great initiative! For simple tracking, you can use the Pomodoro technique with apps like Forest or Toggl. Or try time-blocking in your calendar app. The key is to categorize activities: deep work, shallow work, meetings, breaks, and personal time. This will reveal patterns and help us optimize your schedule.
